Class Importance

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.level.Level
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.messages.Importance
public class Importance extends Level
The (relative) importance of Messages as a level from zero to one.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
